mapper.insert: insert into visit (visitId, visitDate, menuId, memId, restntId) values (#{visitId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{menuId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{restntId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{restntName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{active, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select visitDate, menuId, restntName from visit where memId=#{memId} and active = '1'
mapper.update: update visit set active = '0' where visittId = #{visitId} and active = '1'
